name: The Best of 2013 - A Year In Review / Christmas Letter PDF Template
description: This item is a PDF form template which makes it so simple to write a Christmas letter / newsletter or year in review. Just TYPE in your family's information, SAVE and PRINT! Insert it in your holiday cards or keep one for yourself as a record of your year. The template contains the text "The best of 2013", the rest of the headings/text is up to you. The last image shows what the template looks like when you receive it. This one has a spot to place a photo in landscape orientation. Just click on that area to upload a photo from your library. It is made for 8.5 x 11 inch (letter size) paper and designed to be printed using a home printer. I included a few notes/tips in the PDF which might be of help, and which will not of course appear in the print out. File size : 834KB Colors may vary slightly depending on your computer monitor's settings. Colors and font types are fixed. ------------------------- WHAT YOU NEED: ------------------------- - Please use ONLY ADOBE READER. Other PDF readers may cause issues in form filling. You may download Adobe Reader free at http://get.adobe.com/reader. - A computer (the PDF template is not mobile device/tablet ready) - A home printer ~~~~~~~~~~ In purchasing this item you agree to the following TERMS OF USE : This template is not for giving away/redistribution, and not for resale. ~~~~~~~~~~ Watch a demo video on how it is like to use my PDF newsletters at http://www.thefourthbud.com/about-the-pdf-templates.

name: Ribbons - A Year In Review / Christmas Letter Template
description: This item is a PDF form template which makes it so simple to write a Christmas letter or year in review. Just TYPE in your family's information, SAVE and PRINT! Insert it in your holiday cards or keep one for yourself as a record of your year. This is available in two options as shown in the images to your right: a. The first one has "TRAVELS" instead of "pets" for a title. b. The second one has "PETS" instead of "travels" for a title. Please select the option you prefer before you add to cart. It is made for 8.5 x 11 inch (letter size) paper. The template is designed for those who like to (or would like to) write news in brief.
